channel.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
channel.description:
If you don’t, somebody will.
Here it is. The first song of Auxy 2019. I’m proud of this single trak. I took so many time and effort in this trak. I am glad to consider it my Theme.
![image|503x500](upload://5eEcMWk9krBBTwAeCCgVkHJFxnO.jpeg)
[Ekstrak - Hyperactivity Disorder // Theme (SoundCloud Link)](https://soundcloud.com/xtrk/hyperactivity-disorder-theme) [Ekstrak - Hyperactivity Disorder // Theme (YouTube Link)](https://youtu.be/wUfBoFml5so) Spotify, YouTube Music, and iTunes link coming soon!
...you thought it meant High Definition? Feedback and Constructive Criticism is allowed!

item.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
Update, Update:

Thank you guys for the repost on this song. I really appreciate it. More amazing adrenaline-pumping traks coming soon!

Read full topic

item.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
Cool effect at the beginning. Only issue with that is there’s a plucky sound with reverb right as the note ends & it ends up being louder than the note itself Great beat, probably some of the only good drum & bass I’ve seen in Auxy. When the chords come in, it sounds a little too soft – I’d suggest changing to Sweet Spring or Sweet Saw without any attack so it doesn’t feel “wimpy” if you know what I mean. Some of the piano chords at 2:24 muddy up the mix with the bass, try to fix that up. Overall, maybe add just a bit of variation to keep listeners interested. Doesn’t have to be much, considering drum & bass usually is pretty repetitive – however, in its current state, the level of repetition gets fairly boring.

Other than that, great track! One of the best I’ve heard from you. Keep it up

Read full topic

item.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
item.dc:creator: Vveerrgg
item.description:
Nice tune! gotta get it into Traktor or in the hands of a dj and see how it fits with other tracks… how it fits in a mix. Generally thats the only way to know where to take it. … but from my side outside listening in… it’s got a lot of the core elements of tunes in this genre.

Personally it melody is good and carries it through… but it could use a couple of samples to tell / support the story your’e telling.

Read full topic

item.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Pretty much what @iammane said. Solid work. Could have used some more breaks or little solo melodies which i feel like would have fit the theme/title better. But that bass and those neuro elements in the drops were hella good.

Read full topic

item.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Solid. Normally I’d like to hear more cut up breaks but it’s just personal preference. I think for a straight forward drum and bass track this is really nicely done. You’ve got all the important elements and it carried me through the whole thing

Read full topic

item.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
I would wish that you and @stereofield would take this seriously, and make actual feedback towards the song, instead of making jokes. Thanks!

item.title: Ekstrak - H.D. (Theme) [Electronic DnB]
item.dc:creator: paroxyzm
item.description:
I like the cover art, super simple and it looks like what i would expect the track to sound like. Speaking of, the track itself is very energetic and almost glitchy. Its a pretty cool approach for a track like this and i enjoyed it a lot.

Read full topic
